name: The Cube (itch) (FishTank Studios)
description:
This is our  submission for the Ryan Laley Game Jam 2020.

Its been a challenge to say the least, fitting in the middle of half term, so some extra plates to spin. But seemed to get a working prototype.

The Cube is a puzzle platformer with a few twisits and turns. 

You have 300 seconds to find your way out of the cube with the help of GF101.

GF101, has gravity force ability. This enables him to  move objects on command, to aid possible escape.

Controls:
Movement - WASD
Look - Mouse
Jump - Space Bar
Interact - E
Gravity Force On(pick up) - Left Mouse Button
Gravity Force Off (drop) - Right Mouse Button
P - Pause

NOTE: This has been released with a few know glitches, but is 100% possible to complete. We are going to polish off over the coming weeks, so all feedback welcomed :)

Enjoy!
FishTank Studios
